english: You have missed out no vital steps .
chinese: 你没有遗漏任何一个必要步骤。

english: You may take either of the two .
chinese: 你可以从两个中间挑任何一个。

english: There aren't any candidates i'm interested in .
chinese: 没有任何一个候选人让我感兴趣。

english: I was as much of a nuisance as any small boy .
chinese: 我小时候象任何一个小男孩那样很讨人嫌。

english: We were not at any point contact with the enemy .
chinese: 我们在任何一个据点都没有和敌人发生接触。
任何一个造句挺难的，這是一个万能造句的方法

english: The total internal torque in any system is equal to zero .
chinese: 任何一个系统，其总内转矩等于零。

english: She might get hold of one of the workmen on the estate .
chinese: 她可以把庄园里的任何一个工匠弄到手。

english: There is no infallible head for a church on earth .
chinese: 世上的任何一个教会都没有一位一贯正确的首领。

english: Anyone less determined would have thrown in the sponge .
chinese: 任何一个决心比较小的人，这时肯定会认输。

english: "do" is a substitute for practically any verb of action .
chinese: “Do”实际上是任何一个行为动词的代用词。

english: Full use should be made of any exposures available on site .
chinese: 应该充分利用现场可以利用的任何一个露头。

english: In any long and bitter campaign, morale will suffer .
chinese: 在任何一个长期而痛苦的战争中，士气总会涣散下来。

english: Any young woman would find value in such solicitude .
chinese: 任何一个少女都会从这种体贴入微中发现自己的身价。

english: He had little good to say of any of the white men in the colony .
chinese: 他对这块殖民地的任何一个白人都没有好感。

english: You or any other man with eyes in his head may see that .
chinese: 无论你或者任何一个头上生着眼睛的人都会看得明白。
